channel.title: I need help making the ::xteletome!

item.title: I need help making the ::xteletome!
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

I got the code but the problem is if they have a space in their name like example if this was their name “Killer Bomb” if I do ::xteletome killer bomb , it doesen’t work… you have to put in ::xteletome killer Bomb… After space the Bomb has to have th B capital… How can I ignore the CAPITAL after the space in a command?

Here is my code:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights > 0)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					p.teleportToX = absX;
					p.teleportToY = absY;
					p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
					p.updateRequired = true;
					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					p.sendMessage............[/code]

Read full topic
